./update_db_msgs.pl

   1 #!/bin/perl -w
   2 use strict;
   3 #use diagnostics;
   4 use Data::Dumper;
   5 
   6 use VulnRetrieve::POP3;
   7 use VulnMessage::Mail;
   8 use VulnDB;
   9 
  10 my $vulndb_obj = VulnDB->new();
  11 
  12 my @source_hash_refs = @{$vulndb_obj->source_mgr->get_source()};
  13 
  14 # loop through all sources and grab new messages
  15 for my $source_hash_ref (@source_hash_refs) {
  16     my @msg_objs;
  17     my%source = %$source_hash_ref;
  18     
  19     print "['" . $source{email} . "', '" . $source{email_password} . "', '" . $source{email_server} . "']\n";
  20     my $vuln_retriever = VulnRetrieve::POP3->new( $source{email}, $source{email_password}, $source{email_server} );
  21 
  22     my @msgs = $vuln_retriever->fetchAll();
  23     #my @msgs = $vuln_retriever->fetchSome(10);
  24 
  25     for my $msg (@msgs) {
  26         push @msg_objs, VulnMessage::Mail->parse($msg);
  27     }
  28 
  29     $vulndb_obj->insert_msg(\@msg_objs, $source{name}, 'mail');
  30 
  31 }
  32 
  33 
  34 # go thru and assign all new (is_processed=0) msgs to users whose criteria matches
  35 my @user_hash_refs = @{$vulndb_obj->user_mgr->get_auth_user( query => [ is_active => 1 ] )};
  36 
  37 for my $user_hash_ref (@user_hash_refs) {
  38     my @msg_refs = @{$vulndb_obj->find_msgs_by_user( $user_hash_ref, [ is_processed => 0 ] )};
  39     $vulndb_obj->add_user_msgs( { user => $user_hash_ref, msgs => \@msg_refs } );
  40 
  41     #for my $msg_ref (@msg_refs) { print $msg_ref->subject . "\n"; }
  42 }
  43 
  44 # set all new messages (is_processed=0) to is_processed=1
  45 my @msgs = @{$vulndb_obj->message_mgr->get_message( query => [ is_processed => 0 ] )};
  46 for my $msg (@msgs) {
  47     $msg->{is_processed} = 1;
  48     $msg->save();
  49 }
  50
